name: Cleaner - Phone Cleaner, Memory Cleaner & Booster
description: Has your phone become lack of space?  The ace cleaner can free up your storage space by removing cache files, temporary files and some other junk files with your permission.   Has your phone worked slowly after a long time running? The super Cleaner can also speed up your phone, save battery power, cool down the temperature of CPU by hibernating the running apps.  The super Cleaner is a cleaner master, making your device run well!!    -----------Features  App Manager You can backup or uninstall any app you choose in the list of installed apps. You can also remove Android Package files (app apk) that are installed.  Junk Cleaner Clean Booster - junk turbo cleaner can cleanup the junk files you choose. Clean cache junks including memory cache, clean RAM, ads files and clean other junk files to free up your storage space! Restore memory space and improve the performance of your device. Easily clean junk files for a more clean Android phone! Its your practical Cleaner master & Junk Cleaner!  Phone Booster With Clean Booster - Phone Booster & Phone Cleaner, cleaning unnecessary processes you choose to go speed up your device! Cool down the temperature of CPU, reduce cpu usage and save battery power by freeing up RAM and cleaning cache with the Space Cleaner & Memory Cleaner! To become your battery saver and CPU cooler.  AppLock A smart AppLock - privacy guard, security lock, gives your phone security protection.  You can add an extra password protection to sensitive apps, such as SMS, Contacts, Gmail and any app you choose. Lock your private apps by using pattern or PIN password and keep your secret safe from snoopers.  Ensure security and personal data safe!  Clean Photos Display duplicate photos and your screenshots of your phone. And you can remove any duplicate photos and screenshots you choose.  Easy to Use Just a few steps to speed up your phone and clean junks.   Optimize your phone memory or storage with this Memory Cleaner and Cache Cleaner! Its a good choice to make your phone better!  Clean Booster is your ace cleaner master & Space Cleaner ! Just clean & boost up your phone!
